description: woman on right side of image surrounded by animals with long faces; animal on left side of woman has a large eye and its head is resting on the woman's shoulder; same motif as for publication Il Pantegan by Victor Hadwiger
inscription: LLC in plate: W.G. 19 | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Privat-exemplar | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: E. 134-B | LRC of sheet, in red pencil: 77 | LLC of sheet in pencil written twice, on verso: 2316
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19 | LL in pencil, below image: Träumende.
title: Dreaming Girl
